name: Might and Magic: Swords of Xeen
name_original: Might and Magic: Swords of Xeen
description:
Might and Magic: Swords of Xeen is a RPG game developed by Catware. It was originally released in 1995. New World Computing published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Might and Magic: Swords of Xeen is available on PC.
